title: Once Upon a Goodnight's Kiss
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B01FIVP50A My name is Olivia Preston. I am human, so yes, I have made mistakes. A lot of them. Some I even regret. Most, I will not apologize for. How can I when they are already part of who I am? I will give you one truth, and I will ask for one favor in return: I tricked myself into falling in love with my sister's fiance. While you judge me, wear my heart in your chest. Are you ready?
author: D.N. Hoxa
